00048 void DataSetHeaderTest::NameTest()
00049 {
00050         std::wstring p1 = L"some_name";
00051         header->SetName(p1);
00052         std::wstring p2 = header->GetName();
00053         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p1 == p2);
00054 }

00056 void DataSetHeaderTest::NameValPairCntTest()
00057 {
00058         std::wstring p[] = {L"Uma",L"Thurman",L"Angelina",L"Jolie",L"Isabella ",L"Rossellini"};
00059         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00060         t1.SetName(p[0]);
00061         t1.SetValueText(p[1]);
00062         header->AddNameValParam(t1);
00063 
00064         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00065         t2.SetName(p[2]);
00066         t2.SetValueText(p[3]);
00067         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00068 
00069         ParameterNameValueType t3;
00070         t3.SetName(p[4]);
00071         t3.SetValueText(p[5]);
00072         header->AddNameValParam(t3);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetNameValParamCnt() == 3);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void DataSetHeaderTest::NameValPairTest()
00077 {
00078         std::wstring p[] = {L"Uma",L"Thurman",L"Angelina",L"Jolie",L"Isabella ",L"Rossellini"};
00079         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00080         t1.SetName(p[0]);
00081         t1.SetValueText(p[1]);
00082         header->AddNameValParam(t1);
00083 
00084         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00085         t2.SetName(p[2]);
00086         t2.SetValueText(p[3]);
00087         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00088 
00089         ParameterNameValueType t3;
00090         t3.SetName(p[4]);
00091         t3.SetValueText(p[5]);
00092         header->AddNameValParam(t3);
00093         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin;
00094         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt end;
00095         header->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00096         if(begin != end)
00097         {
00098                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetName() == p[0]);
00099                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetValueText() == p[1]);
00100                 begin++;
00101         }
00102         if(begin != end)
00103         {
00104                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetName() == p[2]);
00105                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetValueText() == p[3]);
00106                 begin++;
00107         }
00108         if(begin != end)
00109         {
00110                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetName() == p[4]);
00111                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetValueText() == p[5]);
00112         }
00113 }

00115 void DataSetHeaderTest::ColumnNameTest()
00116 {
00117         header->AddByteColumn(L"Fred");
00118         header->AddIntColumn(L"Wilma");
00119         header->AddShortColumn(L"");
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(0).GetName() == L"Fred");
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(1).GetName() == L"Wilma");
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(2).GetName() == L"");
00123 }

00126 {
00127         header->AddByteColumn(L"");
00128         header->AddIntColumn(L"");
00129         header->AddShortColumn(L"");
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == ByteColType);
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(1).GetColumnType() == IntColType);
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(2).GetColumnType() == ShortColType);
00133 }

00135 void DataSetHeaderTest::ColumnSizeTest()
00136 {
00137         header->AddByteColumn(L"");
00138         header->AddIntColumn(L"");
00139         header->AddShortColumn(L"");
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(0).GetSize() == sizeof(int8_t));
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(1).GetSize() == sizeof(int32_t));
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetColumnInfo(2).GetSize() == sizeof(int16_t));
00143 }

00152 void DataSetHeaderTest::AssignmentTest()
00153 {
00154         header->SetName(L"pixel data");
00155         header->AddUShortColumn(L"Intensity");
00156         header->SetRowCnt(101);
00157         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00158         t1.SetName(L"Scanner");
00159         t1.SetValueText(L"M10");
00160         header->AddNameValParam(t1);
00161         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00162         t2.SetName(L"Pixel Size");
00163         t2.SetValueText(L"0.051");
00164         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00165 
00166         DataSetHeader assignee;
00167         assignee = *header;
00168 
00169         // Check that the assignment worked
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetName() == header->GetName());
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetColumnCnt() == header->GetColumnCnt());
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetNameValParamCnt() == header->GetNameValParamCnt());
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetRowCnt() == header->GetRowCnt());
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetColumnInfo(0) == header->GetColumnInfo(0));
00175 
00176         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpAssigneeBegin, nvpAssigneeEnd;
00177         assignee.GetNameValIterators(nvpAssigneeBegin, nvpAssigneeEnd);
00178         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpHeaderBegin, nvpHeaderEnd;
00179         assignee.GetNameValIterators(nvpHeaderBegin, nvpHeaderEnd);
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*nvpAssigneeBegin == *nvpHeaderBegin);
00181         ++nvpAssigneeBegin;
00182         ++nvpHeaderBegin;
00183         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*nvpAssigneeBegin == *nvpHeaderBegin);
00184         ++nvpAssigneeBegin;
00185         ++nvpHeaderBegin;
00186         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpAssigneeBegin == nvpAssigneeEnd);
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpHeaderBegin == nvpHeaderEnd);
00188 
00189         // TBD: no test of row offset array.
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 void DataSetHeaderTest::CopyCTorTest()
00194 {
00195         header->SetName(L"pixel data");
00196         header->AddUShortColumn(L"Intensity");
00197         header->SetRowCnt(101);
00198         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00199         t1.SetName(L"Scanner");
00200         t1.SetValueText(L"M10");
00201         header->AddNameValParam(t1);
00202         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00203         t2.SetName(L"Pixel Size");
00204         t2.SetValueText(L"0.051");
00205         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00206 
00207         DataSetHeader assignee(*header);
00208 
00209         // Check that the copy construction worked
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetName() == header->GetName());
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetColumnCnt() == header->GetColumnCnt());
00212         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetNameValParamCnt() == header->GetNameValParamCnt());
00213         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetRowCnt() == header->GetRowCnt());
00214         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetColumnInfo(0) == header->GetColumnInfo(0));
00215         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(assignee.GetColumnCnt() == header->GetColumnCnt());
00216 
00217         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpAssigneeBegin, nvpAssigneeEnd;
00218         assignee.GetNameValIterators(nvpAssigneeBegin, nvpAssigneeEnd);
00219         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpHeaderBegin, nvpHeaderEnd;
00220         assignee.GetNameValIterators(nvpHeaderBegin, nvpHeaderEnd);
00221         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*nvpAssigneeBegin == *nvpHeaderBegin);
00222         ++nvpAssigneeBegin;
00223         ++nvpHeaderBegin;
00224         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*nvpAssigneeBegin == *nvpHeaderBegin);
00225         ++nvpAssigneeBegin;
00226         ++nvpHeaderBegin;
00227         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpAssigneeBegin == nvpAssigneeEnd);
00228         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpHeaderBegin == nvpHeaderEnd);
00229 
00230         // TBD: no test of row offset array.
00231 }
00232 void DataSetHeaderTest::DataStartFilePosTest()
00233 {
00234         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0);
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(header->SetDataStartFilePos(12));
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetDataStartFilePos() == 12);
00237 }

00239 void DataSetHeaderTest::HeaderStartFilePosTest()
00240 {
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetHeaderStartFilePos() == 0);
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(header->SetHeaderStartFilePos(61209));
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetHeaderStartFilePos() == 61209);
00244 }
